You have a Microsoft Entra tenant that contains the users shown in the following table.

//IMG//


You add the following assignment for the User Administrator role:

• Scope type: Directory
• Selected members: Group1
• Assignment type: Active
• Assignments starts: August 15, 2022
• Assignment ends: December 15, 2022

You add the following assignment for the Exchange Administrator role:

• Scope type: Directory
• Selected members: Group2
• Assignment type: Eligible
• Assignments starts: October 15, 2022
• Assignment ends: January 15, 2023

For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
1) YES, Admin1 is an ACTIVE User Administrator for entire Directory because they are part of Group1

2) NO, Admin2 is ELIGIBLE, but not yet ACTIVE to be Exchange Administrator

3) YES, Admin3 is an ACTIVE User Administrator for entire Directory because they are part of Group1
Am I reading this wrong, why isn't this yes, yes, yes?

comments.content: Second one is NO because they are ELIGIBLE, but not ACTIVE immediately on sign-in
